description.english: Freeze 5 enemies in a single encounter
description.german: Friere 5 Gegner in einer einzigen Begegnung ein.

description.english: Defeat 3 enemies with a post parry attack in a single encounter

description.italian: Annienta 3 nemici con un attacco post-parata in un solo scontro.

description.spanish: Vence a 3 enemigos con un ataque post Parada en un mismo encuentro

description.polish: Pokonaj 3 wrogów atakiem po sparowaniu w jednym starciu

description.english: Defeat 5 enemies with a weakspot hit (Rifle) in a single encounter
description.german: Besiege 5 Gegner mit einem Schwachpunkttreffer (Gewehr) in einer einzigen Begegnung.

description.spanish: Vence a 5 enemigos con un golpe al punto débil (rifle) en un mismo encuentro

description.russian: Победите 5 врагов попаданием в уязвимое место из ружья в ходе одного столкновения

description.english: Defeat 8 enemies in a single encounter without being hit
